DOC.criteria: Who able willing give sign informed consent Who male female age 18 65 year plaque psoriasis confirm Investigator . Who less 20 % body surface area ( BSA ) afflict plaque Who neither pregnant breastfeeding , plan become pregnant study . Who history allergy vitamin D3 derivative preparation . Whose serum calcium level exceed upper limit reference range Who use investigational medicinal product and/or participate clinical study within 24 week Who treat systemic therapy within 8 week Who treat biologics within 12 week Who treat topical therapy washout leadin period .
